reviews.title: Crap
reviews.comment: Don\'t waste your time to install this app. It is just the first 24 pages of a book which include the cover, appendix,  bla bla bla...
reviews.author: Joseph Kerollos

reviews.title: Pointless.
reviews.comment: General info on nothing with rubbish images. Waste of time.
reviews.author: Dj Beenie

reviews.title: Don\'t like it
reviews.comment: It is a waste of time
reviews.author: Adolf Satzinger

reviews.title: Rubbish
reviews.comment: Why is this an app? Its just a load of cr@p.
reviews.author: Peter Johnson

reviews.title: Don\'t bother
reviews.comment: You get 24 pages of simplistic information that you can get from your camera\'s instruction manual, and advertising literature. For more, you need to enter an activation code. Please don\'t waste your time. Look elsewhere.
reviews.author: Jeremy McTigue

reviews.title: Does not start
reviews.comment: App does not start at all.
reviews.author: Conrad van der Meer
